    Some Animes You Should Watch Before You Die

    Here is my personal list of my favorite animes, I think everyone should see these before die. Has few classics, but with time I will updating the list.

    The order of listing does not matter at all. I put numbers for ease of viewing and reading.

    1 - Steins;Gate

    2 - Barakamon

    3 - Hyouka

    4 - Kokoro Connect

    5 - Ore no Kanojo to Osananajimi ga Shuraba Sugiru (Oreshura)

    6 - Gekkan Shoujo Nozaki-kun

    7 - Silver Spoon (Gin no Saji)

    8 - Itazura na Kiss

    9 - Golden Time

    10 - Chuunibyou Demo Koi ga Shitai!

    11 - Servant x Service

    12 - Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo

    13 - Summer Wars

    14 - InuYasha

    15 - Fullmetal Alquimist Brotherhood

    16 - Yu Yu Hakusho

    17 - Kaichou Wa Maid-Sama!

    18 - Hataraku Maou-Sama

    19 - One Piece

    20 - Toradora

    21 - Amagi Brilliant Park
